Player History
Injured on 5/11/1966 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/17/1966 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Injured on 9/3/1967 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Detroit in 1972...
Traded from Detroit to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1973 (Going to CHC: P F. Martinez, 3B L. Parrish. Going to DET: P D. Hughes, LF C. Yastrzemski)...
Injured on 6/29/1973 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/26/1975 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/1977 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1978, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1978, off Tom Hall (SF)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1979...
